title: Ranked Season starting in the middle of a preseason game
body: So, I was playing a game of ranked, trying to get my last promo game done for tonight until the new season started which was meant to be the 7th (today is the 6th still) and mid-game the new season started, someone trolled and now I have 1 provisional game which is a loss, though my game started up in the preseason time. Furthermore ranked queues were then disabled while they investigate a problem, meanwhile those who started games during the preseason times have now got a provisional game already. Is Riot going to do anything to reset that once the queues come up or are those who have a loss, not expecting it to be part of provisionals just have to suffer that?

replies.body: I'd say its a bug probz why they have now disabled ranked que
Ahh, I truly hope it is, that is so unfair otherwise to just have no warning that it's the new season start.
